item.description: Expand on this perhaps from a financial vs learning lens https://danluu.com/startup-tradeoffs/#fnref:S

I began writing this post as a rebuttal to Sajith Pai’s ‘Work as Play’ in his Shower Thoughts[1]. It evoked quite an emotional response from me, quite similar to how I see sprezzatura: a form of deceit on behalf of the professional, and unfair expectation to have societally. But I realized that my emotional friction with the post has a more interesting dimension to it. This essay is about the not that often asked question:
